import React from 'react'; import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import axios from 'axios'; import './EmploymentDetails.css'; import { FadeLoader } from 'react-spinners'; import { ToastContainer, toast } from "react-toastify"; import 'react-toastify/dist/ReactToastify.css'; function EmploymentDetails(){ const [modal, setModal] = useState(false); const addNewFamily = () =>{ setModal(true) } const updateFamily = () =>{ } const deleteFamily = () =>{ } const onSave =() =>{ } const onModalClose =() =>{ setModal(false) } return (
Employment Details

Please input details of each of your past job descriptions below. (Starting with the latest first).

Organisation Name Designation Industry Start Date End Date
{modal && (

setDateofBirth(e.target.value)}>
setQualification(e.target.value)}>

)}
); } export default EmploymentDetails;
